author: chetanm
msg: OAK-1856 - Enable specifying of OSGi config via JSON file and in memory map
Added a sample json based config file required for starting Oak with Tar.
In addition the Repository object returned by the factory now implements the ServiceRegistryProvider interface to provide access to the backing service registry

author: chetanm
msg: OAK-1857 - Support collection object conversion to String[] in ConfigurationParameters
If target type is String[] then source value is converted using PropertiesUtil which internally handles all the possible cases

author: chetanm
msg: OAK-1522 - Provide PojoSR based RepositoryFactory implementation
Return null if repository config not supported

author: reschke
msg: OAK-1708 - fix whitespace in log messages
